body:
Ok, thanks! To run the benchmark:
1. Run `./configure` and enable CUDA.
2. `bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime:rpcbench_test`
3. `bazel-bin/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpcbench_test --benchmarks=all > /tmp/benchmark_output`

Read and compare the before and after files for benchmark output.
body_html:

  3. bazel-bin/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpcbench_test --benchmarks=all > /tmp/benchmark_output

Read and compare the before and after files for benchmark output.
body_text:
Ok, thanks! To run the benchmark:

Run ./configure and enable CUDA.
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime:rpcbench_test
bazel-bin/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpcbench_test --benchmarks=all > /tmp/benchmark_output

Read and compare the before and after files for benchmark output.
